name: Within the Trees
description:
A phone call  leads a group of three friends to a nearby forest in search of their friend, Caleb, who has gone missing. Explore the woods and solve puzzles in order to find Caleb, uncover truths, and escape the forest and whatever else lurks within. 

Controls:

W,A,S,D ...........walk
E..................open inventory
R..................open/close clue notes

You may need to use your mouse to interact with puzzles

Press key indicated to make decisions or to leave screens

Ex. 1. Yes  2. No 

Pressing 1 on the keyboard will result in a decision of yes

Developer Notes:

This is only my second game and all development, design and artwork is by only me. I am still fairly new and by no means an artist, but please enjoy nonetheless!

This game is still a work in progress so please let me let me know what you think. Any feedback would be much appreciated. 

Devtober 2020 Post mortem: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1t1D7ZBsRrDBPEAOwwDtL9WSJL8GEHnqF0UVvGcCh-D8/...

Expected Features of Future Updates:

-Ability to save game

-Full length game

-More endings and puzzles
